original_text: Dogs will eat those belonging to Jeroboam who die in the city, and the birds will feed on those who die in the country. The Lord has spoken!’
korean_text: 여로보암에게 속한 자가 성읍에서 죽은즉 개가 먹고 들에서 죽은즉 공중의 새가 먹으리니 이는 여호와께서 말씀하셨음이니라 하셨나니

sentences.original_text: Dogs will eat those belonging to Jeroboam
sentences.korean_translation: 개들이 여로보암에게 속한 자들을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the birds will feed on those
